data.title: So-So Inc. Website
data.explain: An official website for a traditional Japanese craft company, So-so. Technical Specifications: React, CSS, Firebase, Python, AWS

data.title: Beer Weather
data.explain: A Weather App that recommends users a suitable beer depends on the weather. Technical Specifications: React.js, Material-UI, Node.js, PostgreSQL

data.title: My Furniture
data.explain: An e-commerce website where consumers are able to buy their favorite furniture. Technical Specifications: React.js, Material-UI, Commerce.js, Stripe
